column2:
All Titles will be assigned Dynastic Elective succession.
 - You and each Vassal within 2 ranks below (e.g., Counts and Dukes if your title is a Kingdom) can nominate a successor from among your Dynasty Members.
 - Electors must be de jure vassals of the Title if it is De Jure.
 - If the Title is not De Jure (i.e., Titular), any vassal may be an Elector.
 - Nomination preferences are very similar to Elective Monarchy but limited to your Dynasty.
 - Popular with your Vassals and Dynasty Members.
